story_07_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You gotta admit, one thing those Team Break
guys can do well is run away.
story_07_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Hey... Lucario still senses a bunch of those
masked thugs nearby.
story_07_03000/2401_0301_0300_10: We should hurry and find Norman!
story_07_03000/2401_0401_0400_10:
I think so, too!
Who knows what could jump out at us next!
story_07_03000/2401_0402_0600_10: No, it’s not! We should hurry and find Norman!
story_07_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Let’s get up this
mountain quick, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
